post.text: "Just kiss. I don't even wait. I sort of get away with things like that." â€”Donald Trump

comment.author: Robert
comment.text: Hillary, this is so petty. You are going to be investigated by the FBI, I actually can't believe you're still being allowed to run. And the only comments I'm seeing on this video is people telling you how disgusting this crime is. Trump may have said some things in the past that are bad, but at least he isn't a criminal. I hope he wins and that you end up behind bars.

replies.author: Rebecca
replies.text: Trump goes on trial in November for Trump university fraud and in December for rape and we are talking about emails HRC didn't even send?!
